alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 20 at 6:26AM PDT until October 20 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter of a mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Central Douglas County and Eastern Douglas County Foothills, including Interstate 5 from near Roseburg northward and also Highway 38 and Highway 138 west of Glide. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow for plenty of room between you and other vehicles. * Fog makes objects appear farther away than they are * Use low beams. High beams reflect back thick fog, making visibility worse for you and other drivers.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills
